article_text: To mark the opening of the National September 11 Memorial Museum in New York, a look at the WSJ’s front page the day after 9/11. The Journal’s offices were across from the towers, and this paper and subsequent ones were produced at backup facilities in New Jersey.

article_summary:
To mark the opening of the National September 11 Memorial Museum in New York, a look at the WSJ’s front page the day after 9/11.
The Journal’s offices were across from the towers, and this paper and subsequent ones were produced at backup facilities in New Jersey.
